task.title: How to Configure a Microsoft SQL Server Connection

taskbody.prereq: The support to configure a Microsoft SQL Server Connection is available in the Enterprise edition only.
taskbody.context: To configure a connection to a Microsoft SQL Server, follow these steps:

step.cmd: In the Connections panel, click the New button.

stepresult.p: The dialog for configuring a database connection will be displayed.

step.cmd: Select a SQL Server data source in the Data Source combo box.

substep.cmd: Fill-in the URL of the SQL Server server.
substep.info: If you want to connect to the server using Windows integrated authentication you must add ;integratedSecurity=true to the and of the URL, so the URL will look like:jdbc:sqlserver://localhost;instanceName=SQLEXPRESS;integratedSecurity=true;For integrated authentication, leave the User and Password fields empty.

substep.cmd: Fill-in the user name for the connection to the SQL Server.
Fill-in the password for the connection to the SQL Server.
